description.value:
Trigger A creature moves adjacent to the furniture

Effect The spirit shoves the furniture over in an attempt to crush the triggering creature. The triggering creature takes @Damage[(2d10+7)[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true]). On a failure, the creature is additionally knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

stealth.details: (trained) to hear the spirit's grunt of exertion as it works to topple the furniture

details.description: A mischievous spirit pushes a bookshelf over onto a creature.
details.disable: @Check[type:athletics|dc:16|name:Hold the furniture upright] to hold the furniture upright or @Check[type:occultism|dc:18|name:Foil the spirit's influence] (trained) to foil the spirit's efforts to influence matter
details.reset: If the haunt successfully damages a creature with Topple Furniture, the spirit laughs for [[/br 1d4 #Laughing Duration]]{1d4 rounds} as the haunt resets; each subsequent time the haunt activates, it must topple a different piece of upright furniture. If the haunt fails to damage a creature, the spirit wails in frustration and resets after pouting for [[/br 1d4 #Haunt Reset]]{1d4 hours}.
